thought: The first step is to define a new language for highlighting keywords. This can be done through the 'Language' menu, then 'Define Your Language...'.
Now that the 'Language' menu is open, I need to select 'Define Your Language...' to proceed with defining a new language as per the bug report's steps to reproduce.

Now that the 'User Define Language' window is open, I need to open the 'Styler dialog' to edit text style as described in the bug report. I will click on the 'Styler' button under 'Folding in comment style'.

Now that the 'Styler dialog' is open, I need to provide an arbitrary string in the inputs for the font options, specifically the 'Name' field, instead of selecting a font name from the combo-box. Then press enter. So I will move to the 'Name' field, click it and paste the input.
Now that I have pasted the arbitrary string into the 'Name' field, I need to simulate pressing 'Enter' to trigger the bug. After that, I will click 'OK' to close the dialog.
